string.text: Tarro de plástico

A tiny plastic jar. Such jars are always handy for keeping small items safe, especially drugs and medicine. It protects the contents from moisture and ensures the moisture content of the product remains the same.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] basic material
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Empty syringe

A 12mL medical syringe with a lousy plunger. Seems like it has been used quite frequently. With a drug-making kit and proper knowledge, this syringe can come in handy for the creation of various types of drugs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] basic material
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Cuerda

Una buena cuerda sirve para muchos propósitos, especialmente en un lugar como la Zona. Muchos stalkers pueden darle un buen uso, lo que genera un valor comercial bastante alto. About 10-metres long.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] basic material
PlayBoy ruso

100 (somewhat old and crusty) pages worth of prime nude Russian girls. Common contraband among conscripts, criminals, and other unfortunates who are stuck in the Zone against their will. Some westerners joke about it saying: From Russia with love.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Guía de supervivencia de las fuerzas especiales ucranianas

You have studied this survival guide many times before. For this reason, it does not have any educational value, but you should be able to sell it for some quick cash. Some stalkers may want to take a look at it.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Guitarra

La guitarra es un instrumento de cuerda ampliamente utilizado por los stalkers de todas las facciones en toda la Zona para levantar la moral y fraternizar. Stalkers can often be seen playing the guitar in camps, outposts or other places of relative safety - usually by the fire. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Harmónica

For blues and prison romance lovers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Estropajo de acero

La lana de acero, también conocida como lana de alambre o esponja de alambre, es un haz de hebras de filamentos de acero blando muy finos. Se utiliza como abrasivo en trabajos de acabado y reparación para pulir objetos de madera o metal, limpiar utensilios de cocina para el hogar y lijar en pintura ligera. La lana de acero está hecha de acero bajo en carbono (el contenido de carbono es lo suficientemente bajo como para estar cerca del hierro normal). It is not made by drawing "steel wool wire" through a tapered die, but rather by a process more like broaching where a heavy steel wire is pulled through a toothed die that removes a thin wire shaving. Bundles of steel wool can be used in precision equipment cleaning and to improve spreading of lubricants and cleaning solvents.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Grasa industrial

Grease is a semi-solid lubricant. Por lo general, consiste en un jabón emulsionado con aceite mineral o vegetal. Las grasas se aplican a mecanismos que no se pueden lubricar constantemente o donde el aceite lubricante típico no permanecería en su posición. También actúan como selladores para evitar la entrada de agua y materiales incompresibles. Grease-lubricated bearings have greater frictional characteristics due to their high viscosity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
Metal shovel

An old metal shovel used for various field purposes. Few people actually keep shovels in their backpacks as they are quite commonly found in the Zone, especially in industrial areas.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Military field shovel

High-quality black military shovel. Used for numerous field purposes. Training regimen of Spetsnaz soldiers covers hand-to-hand combat and use of hand-held weapons and other equipment for the purposes of eliminating enemies. One famous example is the entrenching shovel which is a formidable weapon in close combat when used by a Spetsnaz operator.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
Mein Kampf

Adolf Hitler's strategic memoires collected in a single book. The book and all that it stands for are hated by many, which makes this an item of high symbolic value. Adolf Hitler (20 April 1889 - 30 April 1945) was an Austrian-born German politician and the leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party (German: Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei (NSDAP), commonly referred to as the Nazi Party). He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany (as Fuhrer und Reichskanzler) from 1934 to 1945. Hitler is responsible for the founding of Nazism, the start of World War II, and the Holocaust.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
Personal journal

A leather-bound journal. It's filled with the original bearer's inner thoughts, observations, and some rough sketches with notations. A light skim reveals helpful advice for the common man, but little else beyond sentimental value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
Map-making kit

Map-making kit containing a set of pens and measurement instruments. Todo en una cubierta impermeable y camuflada de alta calidad. Utilizado y enviado al personal de artillería ucraniano. Algunos mapas aún no han sido completados. Your PDA is much more useful than any of this.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Gafas de soldador

Gafas de soldadura viejas y corroídas con una banda de cuero rota. Las gafas de soldadura están diseñadas para proporcionar protección ocular durante la soldadura o el corte. Useless in their current state and of no to little value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Small survival kit

Kit de supervivencia que contiene tela, agujas de coser y algunas tiras de cuero. Utilizado principalmente como un medio para detener el sangrado y tratar las laceraciones, en manos de un usuario experto este pequeño kit de supervivencia puede resultar esencial durante las incursiones prolongadas en la Zona. It can also be utilized for outfit repairs of even most severe damage.
 
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] immediately stops heavy bleeding
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Decorated jewellery box

A small box that contains finely crafted jewellery. While it is not uncommon for stalkers to poach hooves, horns or teeth from the Zone's mutants, only a select few are skilled enough to craft such materials into treasure like this. However, few stalkers care for such trinkets, and few traders are in the business of exporting such finery.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Manual de mecánica

Manual de ingeniería mecánica. Algunas personas leen estos libros para ampliar su experiencia y aprender más sobre las instalaciones y fábricas en la Zona. Low sale value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Engineering manual

Manual de ingeniería industrial. Algunas personas leen estos libros para ampliar su experiencia y aprender más sobre las instalaciones y fábricas en la Zona. Low sale value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Drug distribution notes

Este cuaderno describe varios negocios de drogas en detalle. Apodos específicos, ubicaciones y hora de reuniones. Some deals are executed through equipment exchanges and others are paid in large amounts of roubles. Al hoejar las páginas, queda claro que Libertad es el principal distribuidor de drogas naturales como la marihuana. Los bandidos son productores y distribuidores de las drogas sintéticas más poderosas (y peligrosas) como el ácido salicílico y la cocaína. Aparentemente, cada facción de la Zona toma parte en estos tratos. In particular, Monolith seems to be taking in large amounts drugs in exchange for more expensive types of ammunition and equipment.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Photo of a loved one

This photo contains a softly rendered figure, smiling back at you encouragingly. Great attention has been given to the lighting and the atmosphere around the person within the frame, demonstrating a thoughtful, observational tenderness.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
Ukrainian MAXIM

This magazine is well-worn but still contains some glossy spreads of beautiful Slavic girls. Many of the pages have been torn out. Some stalkers argue whether it's funny or sad that rookies bring stuff like this into a place as deadly and sublime as the Zone. It smells faintly of cheese.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Leather boots

Todo el mundo es consciente de la importancia de un buen equipo. An extra pair of boots can prove extremely useful and may be the object of envy of other stalkers since it is such a rarity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
Old batteries (emptied)

Only one out of ten batteries found in the Zone still carry some juice. These, however, are completely drained and because of that do not have any value whatsoever.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] depleted
Batteries (emptied)

These batteries have been completely drained of whatever energy they once had. Their only value is the amount of metal they are made of.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] depleted
Military battery unit (emptied)

An empty military battery unit. If full they are very valuable and in high demand due to the relative scarcity of batteries in the Zone. However, now that the juice has run out they constitute a backpack burden.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] depleted
Broken flashlight

The handle is broken and even duct tape wouldn't be able to keep the batteries in place. This is no longer of any value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Soaked underwear

Un par de calcetines extra, una camisa y un pantalón que podrían aumentar sustancialmente tu comodidad. Lamentablemente, este conjunto está completamente empapado. Hay pocas posibilidades de que un stalker pague algo por esta basura. Although they might seem worthless, the material the underwear is made of can be used in armour and weapon maintenance.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
Repuestos de armas

Piezas de repuesto para lo que parece ser un rifle de asalto AKM. Las piezas de madera no están en muy buenas condiciones, y lo mismo puede decirse de los elementos metálicos. Solo los novatos estarán interesados en comprarlas. Sin embargo, parece que pueden ser útiles para reparar el equipo. Certain Zoners replace some parts when finding a new weapon out in the open in order to avoid being hunted for stealing from someone's stash.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
Bed spread

Artículo de lujo en la Zona. It gives you extra 10 percent chance of a good night's sleep. Since there are only a few beds in safehouses in the Zone, having a sleeping bag and a bed spread may prove essential if you don't want to hit the wall in most inappropriate of circumstances. Bed spreads are included in the equipment of some military units.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Walkie talkie

La pantalla está muerta y hay un silbido constante del altavoz que indica que no sirve para nada. Has what appears to be mutant teeth marks on it.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Mazo de cartas

Es importante desviar tu mente del sufrimiento en este infierno y enfocarte en otras cosas más agradables. Jugar a las cartas es un pasatiempo popular, pero una baraja de cartas también se puede usar para clasificar intercambios especiales. The cover depicts the proud architectural design of the Moscow Metro.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Mapas militares

Mapas que muestran la ubicación de los campamentos militares alrededor de la Zona. Each PDA comes with these maps installed, so this item is of little use to anyone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
Old head lamp

Aunque pocos se atreven a explorar la Zona durante la noche, hay circunstancias en las que una lámpara frontal es crucial. And another source of light won't hurt, because you never know when you'll have to move from place to place. Unfortunately, this particular unit has long seen its working days and can now only serve as a source of cheap spare parts.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Espejo telescópico

Espejo pequeño montado en un tubo de hierro telescópico. A handy item used by fighters versed in the arts of urban combat as it allows to peek around corners without getting shot.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
Old hammer (reusable)

Hammer with a wooden handle and an iron head. A common sight in industrial areas of the Zone. Despite its heavy weight, it's often carried in backpack due to its versatility.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] unlimited usages
Lona camuflada

Una lona impermeable (o hootch) es una plancha grande de material fuerte, flexible, resistente al agua o impermeable, a menudo de tela como lona o poliéster recubierto con uretano, o hecho de plásticos como el polietileno. Dispone de ojales reforzados en las esquinas y a lo largo de los laterales para formar puntos de anclaje de la cuerda, permitiendo su atado o suspensión. Sirve para muchos propósitos, pero se usa principalmente para crear escondites pequeños y simples como tiendas de campaña. Trading value is low due to easily found alternatives.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
2 synthetic ropes

Las cuerdas sintéticas se encuentran comúnmente en almacenes militares. Pero por alguna razón, pocos stalkers militares las llevan. Una buena cuerda sirve para muchos propósitos, especialmente en un lugar como la Zona. Muchos stalkers pueden hacer un buen uso de estas cuerdas, lo que genera un valor comercial bastante alto. Each is about 5 metres long.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Field cutlery

Una cuchara, un cuchillo y un tenedor hechos de acero pesado. Un juego de cubiertos robusto y razonablemente liviano, ideal para mochileros y exploradores de campo. Los cubiertos se mantienen unidos mediante un cordón de cobre. If cleaned properly and derusted, it would be safe to use.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Small radio

La música es una buena manera de calmar tus nervios. Pero con una antena rota, esta radio es de poca utilidad. Moisture and dirt have also damaged this item.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Radio rota

Una pequeña radio en malas condiciones. Sucia y dañada por la humedad. El interior parece estar en muy mal estado ya que la radio vibra cuando se mueve. No to little value.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Broken detector

A broken Bear detector. The screen is smashed and the interior seems to be in quite a bad shape. Some of the electronic parts inside are still safe. They can be reused for repair purposes, or perhaps even in crafting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] broken beyond repair
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] unusable
Leather gloves

A pair of leather gloves. Feel and smell good as if they are bought recently. When the weather gets cold, it's important to keep your hands warm and ready.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Hand watch

An old, classic Soviet "raketa3" watch. Looks like it's still in a good shape. It's not surprising that many stalkers prefer mechanical watches over PDAs for usual time checking. Giving the fact that those watches are reliable and durable even at the worst situations, they come in handy where PDAs fail due to strong electromagnetic waves coming from emissions or nearby anomaly fields. However, some simply wear them as a style accessory.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] personal belongings
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
Ball-peen hammer

Also known as a machinist's hammer. Ball-peen hammer is a type of peening hammer used in metalworking. Despite being old and rusty, you can never go wrong with having one for small repair jobs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Duct tape

Duct tape is commonly used in situations that require a strong, flexible, and very sticky tape. An easy and temporary solution for quick repair jobs. This type also has a long-lasting adhesive and resistance to weathering.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
Ammo components for 12x70 shot rounds

Powder, shells and shot - everything needed to make 12x70 buckshot rounds. Has enough to make 40 rounds.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]used for crafting ammunition
%c[0,253,155,155] • %c[0,240,140,140]requires tools
Tools for manufacturing 12x70 shot rounds

Tools necessary for making 12x70 buckshot rounds. 12x70.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]used for crafting ammunition
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]everyday item
Sewing kit

Needles and cloth scraps. Everything you need to make cloth items.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafting Tools
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Common
Sleeping bag components

Everything needed to make a sleeping bag.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafted Items
 %c[0,253,155,155] • %c[0,240,140,140]Sewing kit needed
Backpack components

Rubberized fabric, zippers and rivets. Everything needed to craft a backpack.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafted Items
 %c[0,253,155,155] • %c[0,240,140,140]Sewing kit needed
Tobacco rolls

Loose tobacco, filters and paper.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[0,253,155,155] • %c[0,240,140,140]May cause cancer
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Homemade
Master disassembly tools

Factory made tools designed to disassemble anything. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,155,155,155] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafting Tools
%c[0,255,1,1] • %c[0,100,250,100]Works on high tech gear
Journeyman disassembly tools

A rusted set of tools for medium armour disassembly.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,155,155,155] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafting Tools
%c[0,255,1,1] • %c[0,100,250,100]Works on medium armour
Basic disassembly tools

Improvised tools designed for fabric or light gas masks.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,155,155,155] • %c[ui_gray_2]Crafting Tools
%c[0,255,1,1] • %c[0,100,250,100]Works on light armour and gas masks
SEVA plate

An armoured plate carved from a SEVA suit. Able to stop small bullets and gives some elemental resistance. Can be used for repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Heavy "ESAPI" plate

A ceramic-composite plate that provides class 4 protection. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Medium "SAPI" plate

An armoured plate that provides class 3 protection. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Homemade plate

Hand-made armoured plate using kevlar and aramid. Provides class 2 protection. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Light cloth plate

Hand made kevlar and fabric plate. Provides class 1 protection. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Granite-4M plate

Military heavy armoured plate composed of ceramics. Provides class 5 protection. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Unknown plate

An armoured plate composed of unknown materials. Seems to be made of solid alloy and some fabric. Extremely heavy. Provides class 5 protection (in field tests). Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Ammo pouch

A cut out ammo pouch, used to store magazines. Made of dense and high-quality fabric.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Small armoured plate

A small homemade armoured plate, likely made of melted down scrap. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Green cloth

Green fabric, cut from a green suit. Very high quality and dense fabric. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Black cloth

Black fabric, cut from a black suit. Very high quality and dense fabric. Can be used as a repair material.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Brown cloth

Brown fabric, cut from a brown suit. Very high quality and dense fabric. Can be used as a repair material. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
White cloth

White fabric, cut from a white suit. Very high quality and dense fabric. Can be used as a repair material. 
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Servo drive

A servo taken from an exoskeleton. Looks like it could be replaced with a repair kit.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] ×ÙÓÏËÏtechnological item
Plastic scraps

Bits and pieces of dense plastic, carved from a suit. Can be used for patchs or repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Glass

Pieces of glass cur from gas masks or helmets. Can replace broken glass in almost any helmet with the right tools.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Old shotgun parts

Old wood and metal parts from various smooth bore rifles, all in varying condition. Some of this could be useful for repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Soviet automatic rifle parts

Old springs, barrels and stocks from various soviet rifles, all in varying condition. Some of this could be useful for repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
NATO automatic rifle parts

Old barrels, frames and stocks for various NATO automatic rifles, all in varying condition. Some of this could be useful for repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Soviet pistol parts

Old springs, hammers and frames from various soviet pistols. Some of this could be useful for repairs.
 
%c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
NATO pistol parts

Old springs, hammers and frames from various NATO pistols. Some of this could be useful for repairs.

Jagermeister Liqueur

A German strong herbal liqueur. Made with 56 components and aged for 12 months in oak barrels. The label of the bottle depicts a deer with a cross on it's horns. According to legend, the deer was seen by Saint Hubert, the patron saint of hunters.
